Text.Value: And on that note... pleasure! Look for word from the Guildhall.
Rodent...?

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Holding his head, a little confused - not fully remembering

Text.Value: Hurry up, Zhent. Our guards are dead - this place is already compromised.

EditorData.NodeContext: Playing Jaheira's evil doppelganger - notably nastier, more tense - hurrying the Zhent along to take their coin and go.

Text.Value: Attempt to mask your presence.
All the coin's there - my thanks. It sounds like you made quite a mess getting it, too - all in a day's work for the Lord of Murder, eh?
And you, big man. When did you start worshipping gods? Did they give your wee rodent a worm friend, too?
Seize the initiative - attack.
Of course. I only thought -
Ah. Well. Perhaps I only needed to sneeze.

EditorData.NodeContext: Immediate lurch from towering rage to bemused shrug.

Text.Value: Our Lady. We serve only the Absolute.
My Zhent are in position at the Guildhall. We'll send word when the job is done.
But you, I know. When did you start worshipping gods? Did they give your wee rodent a worm friend, too?
*And suddenly another presence looms in your mind: searching, probing for a tadpole... and finding none.*
Flop all you wish, little fish - but Minsc has caught you.
Of course. Been years since we Zhentarim dabbled in god worship - so easy to get them all mixed up.
Silly me. We Zhentarim are so long past our own godly roots, I'm afraid I forget the half of them.
Some sneak-thief lurks nearby. The same one I sensed in the Counting House.
*And suddenly, another presence looms in your mind. Another tadpole.*
Enough. You will show the Stone Lord proper respect. And you will return to the Guildhall and do as we have paid you to.
All the coin seems to be there, if a little blood-stained. You lot are enthusiastic about your Lord's work.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext:
Wide shot of Minsc, Doppel-Jaheira and Roah mid-discussion. [Table between them optional.]
Establishing shot to mask player's approach from multiple potential angles.

Text.Value: On that note - good luck! The job will be done by the time you get to the Guildhall.
I CAN TASTE YOUR THOUGHTS, COWARD! COME OUT, SO I MAY SPILL THEM ON THE GROUND!
Wait.
You're the boss.

EditorData.NodeContext: Non-chalant - but backing off from her provocations.

Text.Value: Right. I'm sure you have all of this in hand - we'll see you in the Guildhall when the job is done!

Synopsis: After Minsc's successful heist at the Counting House, the player can encounter Minsc and Roah making a deal. The player has the opportunity to interfere here and save Minsc.
